description: Detects a when net.exe is called with a password in the command line
author: Tim Shelton (HAWK.IO)
name: Password Provided In Command Line Of Net.EXE
query: ((((process.executable.text:("*\\net.exe" OR "*\\net1.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("net.exe" OR "net1.exe"))) AND (process.command_line.text:"*\ use\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\:\*\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\/USER\:\*\ \**")) AND (NOT process.command_line.text:"*\ "))
